thread.title: Four-star Texas QB gets offer from Tennessee
thread.title_full: Four-star Texas QB gets offer from Tennessee

title: Four-star Texas QB gets offer from Tennessee
text:
Manage Four-star Texas QB gets offer from Tennessee A Top247 quarterback from Sachse, Texas, posted on his Twitter account Wednesday night that he received a scholarship offer from Tennessee. 
Top247 junior quarterback Jalen Mayden of Sachse (Texas) High School posted on his Twitter account Wednesday night that he received a scholarship offer from Tennessee. 
"Blessed to receive an offer from The University of Tennessee #GBO #GoVols," he tweeted. 
(What's next for the Vols? Make sure you're in the loop â€” take five seconds to sign up for our FREE Vols newsletter now!) 
The 6-foot-2, 208-pound Mayden holds offers from nearly 20 schools, including Ohio State, Houston, Louisville, Mississippi State, Nebraska, N.C. State and Baylor. 
He's ranked the nation's No. 180 overall prospect and No. 8 dual-threat quarterback in the 247Sports Composite for the 2018 class.
